Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pMode
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Use C / D / R / X / M. See inside process for information. Supported operations for holds cubes: Create, Destroy, Release, Export, Import.

Parameters.Name: pCube
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED: Treat which Holds cube(s) ? Provide the base cube name(s). Supports a list and wildcards * and ? and keyword MODELCUBES.

Parameters.Name: pClient
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED or used in conjunction with pGroup. Treat the Holds cube(s) of which client(s) ? Supports a list and wildcards * and ? and keyword MYSELF.

Parameters.Name: pGroup
Parameters.Prompt: REQUIRED or used in conjunction with pClient. Treat the Holds cube(s) of which client(s) in which group(s) ? Supports a list and wildcards * and ? and keyword MYGROUPS.

Parameters.Name: pDelim
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: delimiter character for the different lists. (default value if blank = '&')

Parameters.Name: pDir
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Directory (will default to error file path)

Parameters.Name: pSkipNonExistentHoldsCubes
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: When using lists and wildcards, it can lead to non-existent holds cubes. 1=Silently ignore these. Default=0.
